錪錪錪

錪字的基本解释

錪
tiǎn
古代的炊具，相当于现在的锅。

錪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tǔn］
［《集韻》吐衮切，上混，透。］
见“錪錪”。

錪字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　錪； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1312第04
【集韻】他典切，音腆。【說文】朝鮮謂金曰錪。【博雅】鬴也。【揚子·方言】鍑，北燕朝鮮洌水之閒，或謂之錪。【註】音腆。　又【廣韻】多殄切，音典。義同。　又【集韻】吐袞切，音黗。【博雅】重也。【揚子·方言】東齊之閒曰錪，宋魯曰錘。【註】錪，吐本反。

錪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
錪字的起名意思

暂无。

錪
Basic explanation of words
錪
tiǎn
Ancient cooking utensils are equivalent to current pots.
錪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tǔn］
["Jiyun" Tune cut, mixed up, and through. ]
See "錪錪".
錪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　錪; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1312 04
[Jiyun] He is classic and cut, and the sound is shy. [Said the text] North Korea called Jin Yue Chi. [Bo Ya] Li Ye. 【Yangtze Dialect】鍑, Beiyan North Korea’s leisurely water, or called 錪. [Note] Sound is shy.　[Guangyun] More cuts, phonetic dictionary. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] spit and cut, the sound is curly. [Bo Ya] Heavy also. [Yangtze Dialect] The leisure of Eastern Qi is called Chi, and Song Lu is called hammer. [Note] 錪, vomit this.
錪
